com.fmph.kai.camera

Class Calibration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fmph.kai.camera.Calibration

  • public class Calibration
extends java.lang.Object
    The class, which handles the whole image calibration process, using the methods provided by the OpenCV library.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Calibration.OnCalibrated
      This is the interface for the callback function called after the calibration has been finished.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Calibration()
      Creates an empty calibration instance.
      Calibration(org.opencv.core.Size size, int numRequiredSnapshots)
      Creates the Calibration instance with the specified size and the number of required snapshots.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.opencv.core.Mat calibrateImage(org.opencv.core.Mat frame)
      Calibrates the input image using the matrices storing the calibration data.
      boolean findAndDrawPoints(org.opencv.core.Mat frame)
      Finds and draws the points on the corners of the inner chessboard squares if they were found.
      int getNumSnapshots()
      Returns the number of snapshots to be taken before the calibration itself occurs.
      boolean isCalibrated()
      Tells if this calibration instance is calibrated (either by actual calibration process or by loading the calibration files.
      void loadCalibration(java.lang.String intrinsicFile, java.lang.String distFile)
      Loads the calibration matrices from the filesystem, which were created by `saveCalibration()`.
      void newSnapshot()
      Updates the calibration matrices with the last point coordinates found.
      void setOnCalibrated(Calibration.OnCalibrated onCalibrated)
      Sets the callback function, which is activated when the calibration process is finished.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Calibration

        public Calibration(org.opencv.core.Size size,
                   int numRequiredSnapshots)
        Creates the Calibration instance with the specified size and the number of required snapshots. Creates the `obj` matrix, which is the 3d representation of the board.
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the chessboard (number of horizontal and vertical inner squares)
        numRequiredSnapshots - the number of the snapshots to be taken for the calibration

      • Calibration

        public Calibration()
        Creates an empty calibration instance. This constructor should be used only when the calibration is going to be loaded afterwards.

    • Method Detail

      • isCalibrated

        public boolean isCalibrated()
        Tells if this calibration instance is calibrated (either by actual calibration process or by loading the calibration files.
        Returns:
        true if calibrated and false if not

      • getNumSnapshots

        public int getNumSnapshots()
        Returns the number of snapshots to be taken before the calibration itself occurs.
        Returns:
        the number of snapshots

      • setOnCalibrated

        public void setOnCalibrated(Calibration.OnCalibrated onCalibrated)
        Sets the callback function, which is activated when the calibration process is finished.
        Parameters:
        onCalibrated - the callback function

      • calibrateImage

        public org.opencv.core.Mat calibrateImage(org.opencv.core.Mat frame)
        Calibrates the input image using the matrices storing the calibration data.
        Parameters:
        frame - the matrix representing a frame
        Returns:
        the matrix calibrated using intrinsic and extrinsic matrices

      • loadCalibration

        public void loadCalibration(java.lang.String intrinsicFile,
                            java.lang.String distFile)
        Loads the calibration matrices from the filesystem, which were created by `saveCalibration()`.
        Parameters:
        intrinsicFile - is the path to the file containing the intrinsic matrix
        distFile - is the path to the file containing the extrinsic matrix

      • findAndDrawPoints

        public boolean findAndDrawPoints(org.opencv.core.Mat frame)
        Finds and draws the points on the corners of the inner chessboard squares if they were found.
        Parameters:
        frame - the matrix representing an image, where corners will be drawn
        Returns:
        true if the chessboard pattern was recognised and false if not

      • newSnapshot

        public void newSnapshot()
        Updates the calibration matrices with the last point coordinates found.
